name: Survive Spike
description:
Survive Spike

Move the cube away from the spikes. Tap the screen to move the cube. Use fast reflex to protect the square because a single thorn is enough to end the game. The thorns fall in the music rhythm.

Game modes:

- 1 player : try to get 5 stars in each music
- 2 players on the same device : the player who lasts longer wins

Features:

- Local multiplayer mode for two players
- 16 levels
- Each level has a different music
- The game colors vary with the level

http://www.maxtimoteo.com
